General.Name: Xtra-Gold Resources Corp
General.Description: Xtra-Gold Resources Corp. engages in the exploration and development of gold properties in West Africa. Its flagship property is the Kibi Gold project located in the Republic of Ghana, West Africa. The company was formerly known as RetinaPharma International, Inc. and changed its name to Xtra-Gold Resources Corp. in December 2003. Xtra-Gold Resources Corp. was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Nassau, Bahamas. Xtra-Gold Resources Corp. is a subsidiary of Xtra-Gold Mining Limited.
